price: 24. Wuxuu yidhi: Kani (Qur'aanka) wax kale maahee waa sixir laga soo minguuriyey kuwo kale.
arabic: فَقَالَ إِنۡ هَٰذَآ إِلَّا سِحۡرٞ يُؤۡثَرُ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: faqāla in hādhā illā siḥ'run yu'tharu
